attributes.action: Give the British people a referendum on the EU constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Well it's obvious that the goverment is going to bypass the british public over the EU constitution, Even though we was promised a referendum on it.. 

So make your stand and let them know that you demand the right to Vote on Britain and the EU constitution ..

Not they will listen, but you never know miracles do happen sometimes!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
